channel.title: Music – Billy Porter

item.title: Billy Porter - Love Is On The Way
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 60334

Waking up alone
in a room
That still
reminds me
My heart has got
to learn to forget
Starting
on my own
With every breath
I’m getting stronger
This is not
the time for regret
And I don’t need to
hang on to heartbreak
When there’s
so much of
Life left
to live oh
Love is on the way
on wings of angels
I know it’s true
I’ll get over you
Love is
on the way
Time is turning
the pages
I don’t
know when
But love will
find me again

I am not afraid of the
mystery of tomorrow
I have found
the faith deep within
There’s a promise
I have made
There’s a dream
I’m gonna follow
There’s another
chance to begin
And it’s coming as
sure as the heavens
I can feel it
right here
In my heart
in my heart
Love is on the way
on wings of angels
I know it’s true
I’ll get over you
Love is
on the way
Time is turning
the pages
I don’t
know when
But love will
find me again

I know
deep down
In my heart
I know that
Love is on the way
on wings of angels
I know
it’s true
I feel it
coming through
Love is
on the way
Time is turning
the pages
I don’t
know when
But love will
find me again
I don’t
know when
But love will
find me again
